title: Ayyy any Nexus users here? I got a question...
body:
For some reason my NMM isn't recognizing my Dragon Age: Origins folder. It doesn't find it on the startup scan.

So when I set the path to Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Dragon Age Ultimate Edition, I got the "Does not contain .exe" error. I checked and it does indeed have DAOriginsLaucher.exe

What do?
